scripts.clone:gh-pages: echo 'This will create you a folder with the github website in it.' && mkdir -p ../makecode-gh-pages && cd ../makecode-gh-pages && git clone https://github.com/Buildbee/makecode.git && cd makecode && git checkout gh-pages
scripts.clone:docs: echo 'This will create you a folder with doc images in it.' && mkdir -p ../makecode-gh-pages && cd ../makecode-gh-pages && git clone https://github.com/Buildbee/docs.git && cd docs && git checkout gh-pages
scripts.build:gh-pages: pxt staticpkg --route makecode --output ./built/gh-pages --bump && npm run copy:gh-pages
scripts.copy:gh-pages: cp -R built/gh-pages ../makecode-gh-pages/makecode &&  cp -R docs/ ../makecode-gh-pages/docs && echo 'dont forget to check in the changes in ../makecode-gh-pages'
